column1: * 1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends a medical board examination. 9th Royal Defence Corps at Easington is disbanded and Tolkien is to be based at Thirtle Bridge again.
* 1989 - Heren Hyarmen is founded by Ronald Kyrmse in wikipedia:São Paulo
column3: the name was changed to "Heren Hyarmeno"
column4: the correct Quenya genitive to mean "Order of the South".

column1: * 2013 - La Conexion Española de J.R.R. Tolkien is published in Spain.
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** The Host of the West reaches the Morgul Vale. The Infantry joins Cavalry.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee escape the Orcs and begin their journey along the road to Barad-dûr.Category:Datesde:19. Märzfi:19. maaliskuuta
